section.heading: Authority to issue grants for crime reduction and violence interruption.

para.text: The Attorney General may issue grants not to exceed the total amount of $360,000 for the purposes of crime reduction and violence interruption.

Personnel and non-personnel costs related to administering any grants issued pursuant to the authority provided in subsection (a) of this section may be paid from funds deposited into the Litigation Support Fund established in § 1-301.86b.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Attorney General Grant-Making Authority Temporary Amendment Act of 2019 (D.C. Law 23-42, Jan. 10, 2020, 66 DCR 15334).
